name: Rogue 1d
description:
This game requires python 2.7. This game is 170 lines of python.

This is a Rogue-like game that exists in exactly one dimension. You can:

  • Fight monsters
  • Buy potions and upgrades
  • Explore a procedurally generated 1 dimensional galaxy

You are the warrior Aht. After you cut in line at the post office, an angry dad at the back of the line used his magical powers to banish you to a short one dimensional tunnel that stuffs itself with monsters and loot.

You will only be able to purchase your freedom from this dimension if you can collect 100 gold coins from your new plane of existence.
